sentence.Network_en: Serving Temperature: about 18~20� � C , Uncork at leas one hour before serving.
sentence.Network_cn: 最佳饮用温度: 18~20摄氏度.开瓶1小时后饮用更佳.

sentence.Network_en: DO NOT uncork the champagne but it may be worth cracking open a beer.
sentence.Network_cn: 开香槟庆祝也许为时尚早,不过开瓶啤酒痛饮一番还是值得的.

sentence.Network_en: We're about to uncork some champagne because the Sabres have won their first championship in 22 years!
sentence.Network_cn: 我们准备开香槟,因为剃刀队在这里赢得了22年来的第一个冠军!

entry.def: When you uncork a bottle, you open it by pulling the cork out of it.

example.ex: Steve uncorked bottles of champagne to toast the achievement.
example.tran: 史蒂夫打开几瓶香槟酒庆功。
